title: India – APnA city program – Monthly PM2.5
text:
Under the Air Pollution knowledge Assessments (APnA) city program, we built baselines studies for 50 cities in India. For the cities introduced into the program since 2019, the results also include month by month concentrations from the WRF-CAMx simulations. Below select the city to access the concentrations maps by month. To access the individual city pages with more details, click here .

Choose City here Agartala Ahmedabad Allahabad (Prayagraj) Asansol-Durgapur Aurangabad Dhanbad-Bokaro Dharwad-Hubli Gaya Guwahati-Dispur Gwalior Hyderabad Jamshedpur Jodhpur Kolkata-Howrah Kota Lucknow Madurai Mumbai-Thane Nashik Panjim-Vasco-Margao Puducherry Rajkot Shimla Srinagar Surat Thiruvanathapuram Tiruchirapalli Vadodara Vijayawada-Guntur Visakhapatnam
